function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in daily deaths due to COVID-19","Impact":"Higher burden on healthcare systems, increased mortality rates","Mitigation":"Implement strict public health measures, increase healthcare capacity","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, telemedicine, remote monitoring","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Sensitivity of estimates to serial interval distribution","Impact":"Inaccurate estimates of transmission rates and disease spread","Mitigation":"Use multiple scenarios for serial interval distribution, validate estimates with real-time data","Technologies":"Epidemiological modeling, data analytics, real-time monitoring systems","People":"Epidemiologists, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Uninformative prior sensitivity on \","   }]}
